author: remm
msg: - Check if a node already has a child before adding it. Fixes a bug where
children were duplicated when trying to add a node which already existed.
- Fixes typos in a comment in StructureImpl.

author: remm
msg: - JAXP 1.1 check had an incorrect value.

author: juergen
msg: CodeGuide (Jikes) is complaining without the cast to character. The cast should be no problem for the comparing characters are located in the lower ASCII table.

author: remm
msg: - Add a new AbstractServiceBase class which is used to prevend code
- Allow associating a logger for each namespace.
- Add a Service.getLogger() call which will return the logger which is associated
- The logging policy of some of the exceptions will be modified.
